backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with types, authorization mixins, approval workflows, persistent maps for all entities, ID counters, and helper/validation methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of multiple frontend files describing their functions and behaviors.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Bash script wrapping dfx deploy with retries, cycles/wallet readiness checks, and detailed error handling.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Bash script that pre-creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to prevent CaLM reservation failures.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Explains IC mainnet deployment helper scripts, their purpose, features, and usage instructions.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Provides troubleshooting steps and prerequisites for resolving IC mainnet deployment issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH palettes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, manifest links, icons, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme, categories, and display properties.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing basic offline caching, fetch handling, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication state, profile loading logic, and startup flows including login, errors, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, navigation, logout logic, and PWA install support based on user role.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Reusable dashboard card component with icon, title, optional actions, and styling variants.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a new user profile with validation and submit logic.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays an error screen with retry, logout, and hard reload actions when startup data fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/clear functions, and loads identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Hook that manages detecting and triggering PWA installation via beforeinstallprompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, authentication, maintenance records, payments, notices, and UPI ID actions via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode, mobile tweaks, and print rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Provides a password change form with validation, mutation handling, and logout on success.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a single notice based on route params.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Lists all notices with sorting, CSV export, printing, and secretary-only creation actions.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Displays user notifications, separates unread/read items, and allows marking individual or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows full details of a specific complaint for the user's flat, including status, priority, and resolution note.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Allows users to lodge new complaints and view existing complaints for their flat, with category, description, and priority inputs.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Placeholder page informing users that expenditure viewing is unavailable due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Provides a dashboard with quick-access cards for maintenance, complaints, notices, visitor requests, profile, and expenditures.
Lets users view maintenance records, select month/year, and submit payment details including UPI reference and date.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Enables users to manage and update up to four mobile numbers associated with their flat.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Shows visitor requests for the residentâ€™s flat and allows approving or declining them with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Guard dashboard displaying pending visitor requests and quick navigation to create requests or view notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form for guards to create a visitor request and trigger a WhatsApp message to the flat owner.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Displays full details of a specific visitor request, including status, flat info, and contact number.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: Lists all visitor requests for guards with filtering, status badges, and navigation to request details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Admin view to manage and export all complaints, including stats, CSV export, and print options.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Printable complaints report showing counts and a table of all complaints with statuses and priorities.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form page allowing secretaries to create notices with optional expiry dates and submit them via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Admin interface to view, add, edit, and save monthly expenditure records, with CSV export and print options.
Print-friendly page that loads a specific month's expenditure data and triggers browser print once loaded.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Print view listing all notices with details, sorted by ID, and auto-triggering print after load.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Displays overdue maintenance payments by month and year, with filters and overdue status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Management page to view all maintenance payment records for a period with CSV export and print features.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Print-focused view summarizing payment records for a selected period, including counts and detailed rows.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Renders the secretary dashboard with navigation cards and shows overdue flats if applicable.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: Provides UI for viewing and updating UPI ID and WhatsApp number using query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utilities for escaping fields, generating CSV content, and triggering CSV downloads.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Helpers for current month/year, formatting timestamps, and generating month/year lists.
frontend/src/utils/flatNumbers.ts: Generates valid society flat numbers, validates flat numbers, and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/hardReload.ts: Clears caches and service workers, then forces a full page reload.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Determines whether the current date falls in the overdue period and whether to show overdue notices.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Opens a print-friendly view and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds a UPI deep link URL for payments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep link using a cleaned number and encoded message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements for improving startup error handling.
